AcciaccaturaSpecifier¶

class baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(durations=None, lmr_specifier=None, pattern=None)¶

Acciaccatura specifier.

>>> from abjad import rhythmos as rhythmos

Default acciaccatura specifier:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier()
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Special methods

__call__(collection=None)¶

Calls acciaccatura specifier on collection.

Returns acciaccatura container together with new collection.

(AbjadObject).__format__(format_specification='')¶

Formats Abjad object.

Set format_specification to ‘’ or ‘storage’. Interprets ‘’ equal to ‘storage’.

Returns string.

(AbjadObject).__repr__()¶

Gets interpreter representation of Abjad object.

Returns string.

Read-only properties

durations¶

Gets durations.

Sixteenth-note acciaccaturas by default:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier()
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Eighth-note acciaccaturas:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             durations=[(1, 8)],
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none.

Set to durations or none.

Returns durations or none.

lmr_specifier¶

Gets LMR specifier.

As many acciaccaturas as possible per collection:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier()
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

At most two acciaccaturas at the beginning of every collection:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             lmr_specifier=baca.LMRSpecifier(
...                 left_length=3,
...                 right_counts=[1],
...                 right_cyclic=True,
...                 ),
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

At most two acciaccaturas at the end of every collection:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             lmr_specifier=baca.LMRSpecifier(
...                 right_length=3,
...                 left_counts=[1],
...                 left_cyclic=True,
...                 ),
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

At most two acciaccaturas at the beginning of every collection and then at most two acciaccaturas at the end of every collection:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             lmr_specifier=baca.LMRSpecifier(
...                 left_length=3,
...                 middle_counts=[1],
...                 middle_cyclic=True,
...                 right_length=3,
...                 ),
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

As many acciaccaturas as possible in the middle of every collection:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             lmr_specifier=baca.LMRSpecifier(
...                 left_length=1,
...                 ),
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none.

Set to LMR specifier or none.

Returns LMR specifier or none.

pattern¶

Gets pattern.

Applies to all collections by default:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier()
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Applies to last collection:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             pattern=abjad.index_last(1),
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Applies to every other collection:

>>> rhythm_maker = baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...     acciaccatura_specifiers=[
...         baca.AcciaccaturaSpecifier(
...             pattern=abjad.index([1], 2),
...             ),
...         ],
...     talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...         counts=[1],
...         denominator=8,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0],
...     [2, 10],
...     [18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     [20, 19, 9, 0, 2, 10],
...     ]
>>> selections, state_manifest = rhythm_maker(collections)
>>> lilypond_file = rhythm_maker.show(selections)
>>> score = lilypond_file[abjad.Score]
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_grace_spacing = False
>>> abjad.override(score).spacing_spanner.strict_note_spacing = False
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none.

Set to pattern or none.

Returns pattern or none.
